title: New: Sun Glitters – The Wind Caresses Her Hair
body: [![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/sunwind.jpg "sunwind")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/new-sun-glitters-the-wind-caresses-her-hair/attachment/sunwind/) **Sun Glitters’** new track ‘_the wind caresses her hair_’ is exactly what you’d expect from the man who has remarkably suddenly, changed the landscape of underground beat music. The track hinges around a repeated human voice sample, a muted reverse looped sound, which although seemingly meaningless, manages to encompass a human of loneliness. Elsewhere, the sounds are dissonant and consuming, the beats are eerily disinterested in the piece and the synths are as perfectly layered and richly textured as ever. A great track. the wind caresses her hair by Sun Glitters
